decisions.name: What_type_of_request_was_selected
decisions.label: What type of request was selected?

Flow.description: 8/12/25 LF: Removed & replaced "Identify_Customer_Value__c" as default for "Business Objective" on Routing Request route so we could change field type. 7/17/25 LF: Added Rich Text to each request type for Ticket Description. 5/21/24 LF: Updated to show different picklists if the flow starts on an Opportunity. Updated predefined fields for Delivery Notes and Business Objective on the Routing Request path.
Flow.label: Opportunity - SF - Sales Admin Request

fields.name: Display_Text_Contract_Update_Attach_Files_Notes
fields.fieldText:
Attach all supporting documents below, such as:

  • Client Emails
  • Proposal
  • Discount Approval

fields.name: Screen_Contract_Update_Header
fields.fieldText:
REQUEST TO UPDATE CONTRACT

*Please Note: For open text fields paragraph form is best (no line breaks).

fields.name: Screen_Contract_Update_CreateOppDisplayText
fields.fieldText: ^If you are also requesting Opportunity creation, include the Account Name, Products & Pricing, Stage and Close Date in the Request Description

validationRule.errorMessage: Keep it brief! Please enter a max of 255 characters, including spaces.

fields.name: Screen_Create_Opp_DisplayText
fields.fieldText:
REQUEST TO CREATE OPPORTUNITY ONLY

No Proposal, Contract or Routing Needed

fields.name: Create_Opp_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: ^Be Sure to Include Products with Pricing, Stage, Close Date, and Any Additional Notes. Paragraph form is best (no line breaks).

fields.name: Screen_Proposal_w_Contract_Display_Header
fields.fieldText:
REQUEST TO CREATE PROPOSAL WITH CONTRACT PAGE

*Please Note: For open text fields paragraph form is best (no line breaks).

fields.name: Screen_Proposal_w_Contract_CreateOppDisplayText
fields.fieldText: ^If you are also requesting Opportunity creation, include the Account Name, Products & Pricing, Stage and Close Date in the Request Description
